reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: Scaling up Community-based Maternal and Child Nutrition Services

description.narrative: L'iniziativa è volta al miglioramento della nutrizione materno infantile ,delle pratiche nutrizionale e contribuirà nel lungo termine a ridurre la malnutrizione cronica in Afghanistan.

The project aims to improve the nutritional status of children <5 in the provinces of Laghman and Takhar. The objectives and main outputs of the project are increased coverage, for 68.000 children <2yrs; increased access in of community based nutrition services for households of children< 2 yrs 674 health post and 639 villages/communitie

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: By 2030, end preventable deaths of newborns and children under 5 years of age, with all countries aiming to reduce neonatal mortality to at least as low as 12 per 1,000 live births and under‑5 mortality to at least as low as 25 per 1,000 live births
Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
